"Start scan failed" "Failed to connect to camera. Reset the camera to pairing mode: press and hold the RESET button on the bottom of the camera until you hear a long beep. Reset the camera to pairing mode: press and hold the RESET button on the bottom of the camera until you hear a long beep. Wait for around 1 minute until the camera LED blinks fast." "Failed to connect to router. Ensure the device is near the router. Turn the router off and on again. "Failed to find camera. Reset the camera to pairing mode, press and hold the RESET button on the bottom of the camera until you hear a long beep. Downloading Firmware The download has failed. Please try again. The new firmware has downloaded successfully. Please press continue to update the camera. searching for cameras… Select your device Status Succeeded Enable Pairing Mode With our motion triggered video recording you will never miss a moment again. Any time movement is detected by your camera you will receive a video of the whole event. The free trial will last for two weeks and you can turn this feature on/off at any time in \"Camera Settings\".

If you would like even more detailed information click here

Remove oldest clips (10 clips) Switch to cloud "MAC Address" Download Latest Firmware for \n CAMERA-HD0854 "MCU Version" "S2L Version" //for sensor Please turn on Wi-Fi to add Opensensor Enable WiFi Finalizing OpenSensor setup… Failed connect to wifi. Reset your Opensensor and try again - There is a reset button inside the battery compartment. Press and hold the reset button for 7 sec Stick the two parts of the OpenSensor to the door or window using the sticker tapes as shown Finish Fixing the OpenSensor BabyRoom Window (e-g: Livingroom Window, Kitchen door) TIP : \nOpen sensors can used for another type of doors or window. During normal operations, the Open Sensor LED will blink ONCE every 30 seconds. Your camera is offline now By cancelling this offer, Motion Triggered Recording feature will be disabled on the camera(s).

You can always enjoy the Free Trial option for each camera by enabling the \"MVR\" option in \"Camera Details\"  Apply free trial offer... Disable motion recording... With our motion triggered video recording you will never miss a moment again. Any time movement is detected by your camera you will receive a video of the whole event. The free trial will last for two weeks and you can turn this feature on/off at any time in \"Camera Settings\".

If you would like even more detailed information click here

By using our Cloud Video Recording service, you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy

Overlay Date Setting default values to camera "Failed to apply lens correction" Analyzing Please follow these instructions for best results. Correct way to place the camera Try to focus the complete upper profile of the baby with the baby head completely visible. Wrong ways to place the camera No obstacles like cradle bar, clothes should come in between the camera and the baby. Safety tip: It is recommended that the power cord is at least 1 meter away from the baby. The best results can be achieved only by good lighting condition the preferably baby needs to be under full camera coverage. Baby is not detected You need to point the camera to the baby for the sleep analytics. Click \"Show tips\" to see more. Make sure that you pointed the camera to the baby for the sleep analytics.
